Mage.desc: The Mage is a versatile energy-focused class. It can do damage while providing some utility for itself and allies.
Mage.name: Mage

Clearcasting0.desc: Increase the chance of not consuming resources when casting a spell by $3|9$%.

Clearcasting1.name: Clearcasting1
Clearcasting1.desc: Increase the chance of not consuming resources when casting a spell by $3|9$%.

Clearcasting2.name: Clearcasting2
Clearcasting2.desc: Increase the chance of not consuming resources when casting a spell by $3|9$%.

AncientGrip0.name: AncientGrip0
AncientGrip0.desc: Increase your chance to hold onto your items by $15|45$.

AncientGrip1.name: AncientGrip1
AncientGrip1.desc: Increase your chance to hold onto your items by $15|45$.

AncientGrip2.name: AncientGrip2
AncientGrip2.desc: Increase your chance to hold onto your items by $15|45$.

PartyManaRegeneration0.name: PartyManaRegeneration0
PartyManaRegeneration0.desc: Increase the mana regeneration of your party by +$2|6$.

PartyManaRegeneration1.name: PartyManaRegeneration1
PartyManaRegeneration1.desc: Increase the mana regeneration of your party by +$2|6$.

PartyManaRegeneration2.name: PartyManaRegeneration2
PartyManaRegeneration2.desc: Increase the mana regeneration of your party by +$2|6$.

CarefulTouch0.name: CarefulTouch0
CarefulTouch0.desc: Decrease the damage your items take by $10|30$%.

CarefulTouch1.name: CarefulTouch1
CarefulTouch1.desc: Decrease the damage your items take by $10|30$%.

CarefulTouch2.name: CarefulTouch2
CarefulTouch2.desc: Decrease the damage your items take by $10|30$%.

DeathGrip0.name: DeathGrip0
DeathGrip0.desc: Decrease your chance of dropping items on death by $5|15$%.

DeathGrip1.name: DeathGrip1
DeathGrip1.desc: Decrease your chance of dropping items on death by $5|15$%.

DeathGrip2.name: DeathGrip2
DeathGrip2.desc: Decrease your chance of dropping items on death by $5|15$%.

NaturalArmor0.name: NaturalArmor0
NaturalArmor0.desc: Harden your skin, increasing your natural armor class by $2|6$.

NaturalArmor1.name: NaturalArmor1
NaturalArmor1.desc: Harden your skin, increasing your natural armor class by $2|6$.

NaturalArmor2.name: NaturalArmor2
NaturalArmor2.desc: Harden your skin, increasing your natural armor class by $2|6$.

EnergyWaveWiden0.name: EnergyWaveWiden0
EnergyWaveWiden0.desc: Your Energy Wave spell range is widened by $1|1$ tile.

LingeringAsper0.name: LingeringAsper0
LingeringAsper0.desc: Your Asper spell also leaves a $3|9$ round EoT that continues to drain the target MP.

ConcussiveBolt0.name: ConcussiveBolt0
ConcussiveBolt0.desc: Your Magic Bolt spell will have a $5|15$% chance to stun the enemy.

EnergeticBolts0.name: EnergeticBolts0
EnergeticBolts0.desc: Your Magic Bolt spell will successively cost 3 more MP (up to +30) per cast and increase the damage by 5% (up to +50%) for seconds.

MagicMissile.name: MagicMissile
MagicMissile.desc: Inflict energy damage on a single target. Cost: 5 MP

Identify.name: Identify
Identify.desc: Identify the attributes of the item in your right hand. Cost: 15 MP

Transmute.name: Transmute
Transmute.desc: Convert the items on your current tile into gold. Allows directional targeting. Cost: 15 MP

EnergyWave.name: EnergyWave
EnergyWave.desc: Cast an area energy effect from your location (3x3). Cost: 45 MP

Push.name: Push
Push.desc: Push an enemy around. Cost: 25 MP

MagicBolt.name: MagicBolt
MagicBolt.desc: Inflict energy damage on a single target. Cost: 20 MP

Teleport.name: Teleport
Teleport.desc: Teleport to a previously-memorized location. Cost: 50% MP

MassTeleport.name: MassTeleport
MassTeleport.desc: Teleport those on your tile to a previously-memorized location. Cost: 100% MP

Asper.name: Asper
Asper.desc: Drain mana from a single target. Cost: 10 MP

ConjureHealing.name: ConjureHealing
ConjureHealing.desc: Create a bottle of bound healing water. Cost: 25 MP

Protector.desc: The Protector focuses on learning useful reinforcement spells for itself and allies.
Protector.name: Protector

DarknessWiden0.name: DarknessWiden0
DarknessWiden0.desc: Your Darkness spell range is widened by $1|1$ tile.

WandSpecialty0.name: WandSpecialty0
WandSpecialty0.desc: Spells cost $5|15$% less to cast while holding a wand in your right hand.

WandSpecialty1.name: WandSpecialty1
WandSpecialty1.desc: Spells cost $5|15$% less to cast while holding a wand in your right hand.

WandSpecialty2.name: WandSpecialty2
WandSpecialty2.desc: Spells cost $5|15$% less to cast while holding a wand in your right hand.

MitigatingMagic0.name: MitigatingMagic0
MitigatingMagic0.desc: Your Magic Shield spell will increase your mitigation by $5|15$.

TrueSight.name: TrueSight
TrueSight.desc: See hidden walls and other hidden features. Cost: 25 MP

BarWater.name: BarWater
BarWater.desc: Shield water damage for a single target. Cost: 20 MP

BarFire.name: BarFire
BarFire.desc: Shield fire damage for a single target. Cost: 20 MP

BarFrost.name: BarFrost
BarFrost.desc: Shield frost damage for a single target. Cost: 20 MP

MagicShield.name: MagicShield
MagicShield.desc: Negate some physical damage. Cost: 100 MP

Absorption.name: Absorption
Absorption.desc: Absorb all types of magic. Cost: 100 MP

Darkness.name: Darkness
Darkness.desc: Drop an area darkness effect on the target (3x3). Allows directional targeting. Cost: 25 MP

DarkVision.name: DarkVision
DarkVision.desc: See in the darkness. Cost: 25 MP

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.desc: Become invisible to the average vision. Cost: 100 MP

Haste.name: Haste
Haste.desc: Act twice as fast. Cost: 200 MP

Elementalist.desc: The Elementalist focuses on the dichotomous fire and ice magics.
Elementalist.name: Elementalist

FireMistWiden0.name: FireMistWiden0
FireMistWiden0.desc: Your Fire Mist spell range is widened by $1|1$ tile.

IceMistWiden0.name: IceMistWiden0
IceMistWiden0.desc: Your Ice Mist spell range is widened by $1|1$ tile.

ForgedFire0.name: ForgedFire0
ForgedFire0.desc: Your fire spells burn the opponent more quickly.

ForgedFire1.name: ForgedFire1
ForgedFire1.desc: Your fire spells burn the opponent more quickly.

ForgedFire2.name: ForgedFire2
ForgedFire2.desc: Your fire spells burn the opponent more quickly.

FrostedTouch0.name: FrostedTouch0
FrostedTouch0.desc: Your ice spells freeze the opponent more quickly.

FrostedTouch1.name: FrostedTouch1
FrostedTouch1.desc: Your ice spells freeze the opponent more quickly.

FrostedTouch2.name: FrostedTouch2
FrostedTouch2.desc: Your ice spells freeze the opponent more quickly.

ThermalBarrier0.name: ThermalBarrier0
ThermalBarrier0.desc: Your fire and ice protection spells are enhanced by +$20|60$%.

ThermalBarrier1.name: ThermalBarrier1
ThermalBarrier1.desc: Your fire and ice protection spells are enhanced by +$20|60$%.

ThermalBarrier2.name: ThermalBarrier2
ThermalBarrier2.desc: Your fire and ice protection spells are enhanced by +$20|60$%.

FriendlyFire0.name: FriendlyFire0
FriendlyFire0.desc: Your fire and ice spells have a +$10|30$% chance of not hitting allied creatures.

FriendlyFire1.name: FriendlyFire1
FriendlyFire1.desc: Your fire and ice spells have a +$10|30$% chance of not hitting allied creatures.

FriendlyFire2.name: FriendlyFire2
FriendlyFire2.desc: Your fire and ice spells have a +$10|30$% chance of not hitting allied creatures.

FireMist.name: FireMist
FireMist.desc: Cast an area fire effect on a target (3x3). Allows directional targeting. Cost: 35 MP

IceMist.name: IceMist
IceMist.desc: Cast an area ice effect on a target (3x3). Allows directional targeting. Cost: 35 MP

Combust.name: Combust
Combust.desc: Inflict fire damage on a single target. Cost: 20 MP

Hail.name: Hail
Hail.desc: Inflict ice damage on a single target. Cost: 20 MP

Firethorns.name: Firethorns
Firethorns.desc: Physical attackers take fire damage. Cost: 100 MP

Frostspikes.name: Frostspikes
Frostspikes.desc: Physical attackers take ice damage. Cost: 100 MP

Battlemage.desc: The Battlemage applies their extensive magic knowledge to physical combat, and they are also capable of conjuring familiars to help.
Battlemage.name: Battlemage

LearnedStrikes0.name: LearnedStrikes0
LearnedStrikes0.desc: Gain weapon skill with each strike.

CrossoverKnowledge0.name: CrossoverKnowledge0
CrossoverKnowledge0.desc: Half of your weapon skill will apply to your magical skills as well.

LightenArmor0.name: LightenArmor0
LightenArmor0.desc: Your armor no longer hinders your spellcasting.

BladedWands0.name: BladedWands0
BladedWands0.desc: You treat wands as longswords at tier + 3 for the purposes of combat calculations.

StrongMind0.name: StrongMind0
StrongMind0.desc: Add $100|100$% of your INT to your STR in melee combat.

FindFamiliarBear0.name: FindFamiliarBear0
FindFamiliarBear0.desc: You can now summon a bear, which has a lot of HP and can taunt your enemies.

FindFamiliarWolf0.name: FindFamiliarWolf0
FindFamiliarWolf0.desc: You can now summon a wolf, which can do strong physical attacks.

FindFamiliarChillspider0.name: FindFamiliarChillspider0
FindFamiliarChillspider0.desc: You can now summon a chillspider, which slows foes.

FindFamiliarSalamander0.name: FindFamiliarSalamander0
FindFamiliarSalamander0.desc: You can now summon a salamander, which has the ability to cast fire.

VolcanoStanceImproved0.name: VolcanoStanceImproved0
VolcanoStanceImproved0.desc: Do $10|30$% more fire damage per physical hit (while resisting that much more fire damage) while in Volcano stance.

VolcanoStanceImproved1.name: VolcanoStanceImproved1
VolcanoStanceImproved1.desc: Do $10|30$% more fire damage per physical hit (while resisting that much more fire damage) while in Volcano stance.

GlacierStanceImproved0.name: GlacierStanceImproved0
GlacierStanceImproved0.desc: Do $10|30$% more ice damage per physical hit (while resisting that much more ice damage) while in Glacier stance.

GlacierStanceImproved1.name: GlacierStanceImproved1
GlacierStanceImproved1.desc: Do $10|30$% more ice damage per physical hit (while resisting that much more ice damage) while in Glacier stance.

LingeringDrain0.name: LingeringDrain0
LingeringDrain0.desc: Your Drain spell also leaves a $3|9$ round EoT that continues to drain the target HP.

DrainSlash0.name: DrainSlash0
DrainSlash0.desc: You have a $5|15$% chance of casting Drain on your melee target when using Rift Slash.

RiftSlash.name: RiftSlash
RiftSlash.desc: Warp through the rift and physically attack your enemy. Cost: 10 MP

VolcanoStance.name: VolcanoStance
VolcanoStance.desc: Become more offensive, increasing your physical offensive capabilities, your fire resistance, and doing fire damage on physical hits.

GlacierStance.name: GlacierStance
GlacierStance.desc: Become more defensive, increasing your physical defensive capabilities, ice resistance, and doing ice damage on physical hit.

ImbueFrost.name: ImbueFrost
ImbueFrost.desc: Augment physical attacks to do bonus ice damage. Cost: 100 MP

ImbueFlame.name: ImbueFlame
ImbueFlame.desc: Augment physical attacks to do bonus fire damage. Cost: 100 MP

ImbueEnergy.name: ImbueEnergy
ImbueEnergy.desc: Augment physical attacks to do bonus energy damage. Cost: 100 MP

FindFamiliar.name: FindFamiliar
FindFamiliar.desc: Summon a familiar. Channel: 5s. Cost: 100 MP

Drain.name: Drain
Drain.desc: Drain health from a single target. Cost: 10 MP

SustainedImmunity0.name: SustainedImmunity0
SustainedImmunity0.desc: Increase the duration of bad "Recently" effects by $20|60$%.

SustainedImmunity1.name: SustainedImmunity1
SustainedImmunity1.desc: Increase the duration of bad "Recently" effects by $20|60$%.

SustainedImmunity2.name: SustainedImmunity2
SustainedImmunity2.desc: Increase the duration of bad "Recently" effects by $20|60$%.

AncientPotions0.name: AncientPotions0
AncientPotions0.desc: Increase the healing from all potions by $500|1500$.

AncientPotions1.name: AncientPotions1
AncientPotions1.desc: Increase the healing from all potions by $500|1500$.

AncientPotions2.name: AncientPotions2
AncientPotions2.desc: Increase the healing from all potions by $500|1500$.
